(Epstein vic) Subject: FW: Contact info for victim

Importance: Normal 
Can I add this person. I would like to email them and ask who would like to get notification in the case the system will 
only allow me to put one law firm.

To: =, (USANYS) 
Subject: Contact info for victim (Epstein vic) 
Through her 3 attorneys. 
I)Daniel Kaiser 
Kaiser Saurbom & Mair P.C. 
2) William Kaiser 
111111
P.C. 
3) Kimberly Lerner
